title: The Living forest
creator_credit: Tom Morrison, Ken J. Widdowson and Victorian Forests Commission
brief_description: A film which shows how man is making heavy demands on the earth’s remaining forests. A detailed study is made of the ecology of a eucalypt forest and the many plants and animals which make up the forest environment.
creator_credit_for_label: Tom Morrison, Ken J. Widdowson and Victorian Forests Commission
